18184912.admreg: Europe and Central Asia,Europe and Central Asia

abstracts.cdata!:
The project includes: investments in
            water pollution control works by industries, particularly
            pulp and paper industry, from 1975 to 1977; research to
            improve design and implementation of national program for
            water pollution control.
